== Tholur (CT) (627830) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Tholur (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 3.66 sq. km. and harbouring 1775 households with total population of 7454 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 263 km. Male population is 3543 and female population is 3911. Scheduled Caste population is 1102 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3. Census Location Code of the town is 627830<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (Population 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Poonkunnam at a distance of 14 km.
